title: Newly built lakeside luxury house for sale
details:
Brand new built, luxury lakeside property up for immediate sale by owner at a prime location in Rajagiriya near to Ambagaha junction with quick access to Fuel stations, supermarkets, Rajagiriya main road and restaurants

4 Bedrooms
Lake view family room/TV area on 2nd floor
Front and rear gardens
5 ceramic tiled toilets with modern fittings
Teak fitted pantry
kitchen
Parking for 4 vehicles
Drivers toilet
Servants room with attached toilet
Roller shutter gate facing main road
3550 Sq. Ft.
30 Perch land
